name: Roundabout Adventure
description:
This game was created in Unreal Engine for the Extra Credits Game Jam 3. The entire game was created by myself. Assets were created from the defaults in Unreal Engine and textures were from GameTextures.com

Play as an adventurous little circle through a speeding track an surviving as long as possible. As you go through the rings, you will progressively get faster. Make sure to change your color to match the ring or otherwise you will lose a life. Once you lose all your lives, then it is game over.

Controls:

Numpad 1: Change color to red

Numpad 2: Change color to yellow

Numpad 3: Change color to blue

Numpad 4: Change color to green

Numpad 5: Change color to orange

Numpad 1: Change color to purple
